full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BLA MA DANG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GSUM DBYER MED KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RTZA BA'I BLA MA DANG, RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED, CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GSUM DBYER MED DU MOS TE GSOL @005B 'DEBS PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SHAMBHA LAR SKYE BA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,DGE BSGOS DGE SLONG DBYIG GNYEN, ,DGE SLONG CHOS LDAN RNAM DAG BCAS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE 'KHOR BA RTZA GNYER RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR RO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
